title: [W]Your response has been submitted
p1: [W]You should receive email confirmation from the tribunal office processing your response within 5 working days. You may need to check your junk mail folder.
linkText: [W]Contact the tribunal about the case (opens in new tab)
heading4: [W]For questions about the employment tribunal process
p3: [W]Call one of our Employment Tribunal customer contact centres. They cannot give you legal advice.
